00039 #include <cmath>
00040 #include <float.h>
00041 
00042 #include "NormalVector.h"
00043 #include "Vector3D.h"
00044 
00045 NormalVector::NormalVector( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00046 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00047 {
00048 }
00049 
00050 NormalVector::NormalVector( const Vector3D& vector )
00051 : x(vector.x), y(vector.y), z(vector.z)
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 NormalVector::~NormalVector( )
00056 {
00057 }
00058 
00059 NormalVector& NormalVector::operator+=( const NormalVector& nV )
00060 {
00061         x += nV.x;
00062     y += nV.y;
00063     z += nV.z;
00064     return *this;
00065 }
00066 
00067 NormalVector& NormalVector::operator-=( const NormalVector& nV )
00068 {
00069     x -= nV.x;
00070     y -= nV.y;
00071     z -= nV.z;
00072     return *this;
00073 }
00074 
00075 NormalVector& NormalVector::operator*=( double scalar )
00076 {
00077         x *= scalar;
00078     y *= scalar;
00079     z *= scalar;
00080     return *this;
00081 }
00082 
00083 NormalVector NormalVector::operator*( double scalar ) const
00084 {
00085         return NormalVector( x * scalar, y * scalar, z * scalar );
00086 }
00087 
00088 NormalVector& NormalVector::operator/=( double scalar )
00089 {
00090         double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00091     x *= inv;
00092     y *= inv;
00093     z *= inv;
00094     return *this;
00095 }
00096 
00097 NormalVector NormalVector::operator/( double scalar ) const
00098 {
00099         double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00100     return NormalVector( x * inv, y * inv, z * inv );
00101 }
00102 
00103 NormalVector NormalVector::operator-() const
00104 {
00105         return NormalVector( -x, -y, -z );
00106 }
00107 
00108 bool NormalVector::operator==( const NormalVector& nV ) const
00109 {
00110         if( this == &nV ) return true;
00111     else return( ( fabs(x - nV.x) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00112                                  ( fabs(y - nV.y) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00113                                  ( fabs(z - nV.z) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00114 }
00115 
00116 bool NormalVector::operator!=( const NormalVector& nV ) const
00117 {
00118         return !( *this == nV );
00119 }
00120 
00121 double NormalVector::operator[]( int i ) const
00122 {
00123         if( i == 0 ) return x;
00124     else if( i == 1 ) return y;
00125     return z;
00126 }
00127 
00128 double& NormalVector::operator[]( int i )
00129 {
00130         if( i == 0 ) return x;
00131     else if( i == 1 ) return y;
00132     return z;
00133 }
00134 
00135 double NormalVector::lengthSquared( ) const
00136 {
00137         return( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00138 }
00139 
00140 double NormalVector::length( ) const
00141 {
00142         return sqrt( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00143 }
00144 
00145 NormalVector operator+( NormalVector lhs, const NormalVector& rhs )
00146 {
00147         // Note that lhs is taken by value
00148         return lhs += rhs;
00149 }
00150 
00151 NormalVector operator-( NormalVector lhs, const NormalVector& rhs )
00152 {
00153         // Note that lhs is taken by value
00154         return lhs -= rhs;
00155 }
00156 
00157 NormalVector operator*( double scalar, const NormalVector& nV )
00158 {
00159         return NormalVector( scalar * nV.x, scalar * nV.y, scalar * nV.z );
00160 }
00161 
00162 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const NormalVector& nV )
00163 {
00164         os << nV.x << ", " << nV.y << ", " << nV.z;
00165     return os;
00166 }
00167 
00168 double DotProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const NormalVector& nB )
00169 {
00170         return nA.x*nB.x + nA.y*nB.y + nA.z*nB.z;
00171 }
00172 
00173 double AbsDotProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const NormalVector& nB )
00174 {
00175         return fabs( DotProduct( nA, nB ) );
00176 }
00177 
00178 NormalVector Normalize( const NormalVector& nV )
00179 {
00180         return nV / nV.length();
00181 }
